text: The men's pole vault event at the 2006 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Beijing, China, at Chaoyang Sports Centre on 17 and 19 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Germán Chiaraviglio ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Yang Yansheng ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Leonid Kivalov ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
